dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: 1,2-Ethane diol; Glycol; Ethylene alcohol; Monoethylene glycol; MEG; Ethane-1,2-diol
1,2-Ethane diol; Glycol; Ethylene alcohol; Monoethylene glycol; MEG; Ethane-1,2-diol
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Ethylene glycol is a chemical compound widely used as an automotive antifreeze and a precursor to polymers. In terms of processing level, it is a pure substance produced industrially. The technical aspects include its production through the ethylene oxide hydration process. It complies with relevant chemical standards, and quality metrics are used to ensure purity. Usage information includes its application in polyester fiber production, as a coolant and heat transfer agent, and as a raw material in PET resin manufacturing. The production route originates from ethylene, and as a product, it is often available to consumers in various grades and to industrial facilities at the plant. It is part of a production mix.
乙二醇是一种广泛用作汽车防冻液和聚合物前体的化学品。从加工水平来看，它是工业上生产的纯净物质。技术方面包括通过乙烯氧化物水合过程生产。它符合相关化学标准，使用质量指标确保纯度。用途信息包括在聚酯纤维生产中的应用，作为冷却剂和热传递剂，以及作为PET树脂制造的原材料。生产路线源自乙烯，作为产品，它通常以不同等级的形式提供给消费者以及在工厂提供给工业设施。它是生产混合物的一部分。
